text:
Please add an optional '%' item for logging user session id in the access log. 
This will allow to better tracking the activities of a single user session.

The ID can be the actual session id of the user (from the 'session' cookie), 
some hash of it (slower but safer) or an internal ID used by the server.

The purpose is to be able to collect requests that belong to the same session.
creator: tal@zapta.com
amyroh@apache.org
text:
The enhancement added to the HEAD branch with pattern "%S".  Thanks for the 
idea. :-)

Amy
